column8: Need to ensure that Philip is provided every means to a full recovery. Bob will need to face disciplinary actions. Forklift speed should be limited via mechanical governor installation.
column9: Bob was driving a forklift\, most likely too fast\, with a heavy pallet and it flipped over on a corner. It fell onto Philip and his left arm was pinned and crushed as a result. He is in the hospital at this point. Bob was not injured. There was also extensive damage to the forklift.
